ej,altoj101,C,westj901,Fair/foul call ej,zimmd101,M,westj901,Fair/foul call $Ryne Sandberg hit a fly ball to LF that was just inside the pole for a homer; when Giants' manager Roger Craig argued 3B umpire Bill Hohn's call, HP umpire Randy Marsh and 1B umpire (and crew chief) Harry Wendelstedt and 2B umpire Joe West huddled and reversed Hohn's call; Cubs' manager Don Zimmer came onto the field and launched a 10-minute tirade; West ejected Zimmer, who threw his hat into the stands as he left the field; Cubs coach Joe Altobelli was also ejected by West
$Kevin Blankenship missed the base
ej,cookd001,P,davig901,Bench jockeying Dennis Cook ejected by HP umpire Gerry Davis from the bench

umpchange,2,umphome,quicj901 umpchange,2,ump1b,rennd901 umpchange,2,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Hohn left after being hit on arm by pitch; 1B umpire Quick went behind plate, 2B umpire Rennert moved to 1st; game finished with 3 umpires
$Domingo Ramos and Curtis Wilkerson collided under wind-blown pop
$Kevin McReynolds double lodged behind foul pole in LF corner
$Hector Villaneuva left after being hit in hand by pitch
